title: How Lando Norris achieved his lifetime's ambition of F1 world title by 'winning it my way'
subtitle: There were bumps in the road but Lando Norris has secured his first F1 drivers' title and says he is proud "because I feel like I made a lot of other people happy".
full_text: There were bumps in the road but Lando Norris has secured his first F1 drivers' title and says he is proud "because I feel like I made a lot of other people happy".
